dc_title_s: Map of the central province of Ceylon : exhibiting the situation of coffee estates
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:170,000]. (E 80째11'01"--E 81째07'53"/N 7째40'50"--N 6째20'17"). Relief shown as hachures and heights. Shows: administrative boundaries, roads, coffee estates."June 1873." Inset:"View of coffee plantation." Dimensions: 85 x 122 centimeters
